title: Simulation/VR-Based Foreign Language Education Workshop: Secondary Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A process where in-service secondary foreign language teachers practice real-classroom scenarios in VR, strengthening practical competencies through feedback and collaboration

learning_goals: Participants can apply more than three communication strategies in real foreign language classroom settings through VR simulations
Participants can improve lesson designs at least twice based on peer evaluations and expert feedback
Participants can independently operate a foreign language education workshop once using collaboration tools in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
